title: Spiced fillet of lamb in filo pastry
description: These lamb parcels deliver a huge injection of flavour in the form of fiery chillies and smoked paprika.
ingredients: 4 lamb neck fillets, trimmed of fat and sinew
salt and freshly ground black pepper
3 dried chipotle chillies, soaked in water overnight and blended to a purée
1 roasted red pepper, cut into quarters
